mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Community (community_idx, member_idx, tag1, tag2, tag3, subject, content, photo, like_count, read_count, content_type, write_day) VALUES (#{community_idx}, #{member_idx}, #{tag1}, #{tag2}, #{tag3}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{photo}, #{like_count}, #{read_count}, #{content_type}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Community ORDER BY community_idx desc;
mapper.update: UPDATE Community SET read_count=read_count+1 WHERE community_idx=#{community_idx}
mapper.select: select * from Community order by community_idx desc limit #{start}, #{perPage}
select * from Community WHERE content_type=0 order by community_idx desc limit #{start}, #{perPage}
select * from Community WHERE content_type=1 or content_type=2 order by community_idx desc limit #{start}, #{perPage}
mapper.update: UPDATE Community SET like_count= like_count+1 WHERE community_idx=#{community_idx}
UPDATE Community SET content_type=content_type+1 WHERE community_idx=#{community_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Community WHERE content_type=0 ORDER BY like_count desc limit 5;
SELECT * FROM Community WHERE content_type=1 or content_type=2 ORDER BY write_day desc limit 5;
mapper.update: update CommunityScrap set scrap_count=#{scrap_count} where community_idx=#{community_idx} and member_idx=#{member_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from CommunityScrap where community_idx=#{community_idx} and member_idx=#{member_idx}
